HOW_TO_FIND.HEADER: How to find your trade url link
HOW_TO_FIND.STEP3: Check if your inventory is open at:
HOW_TO_FIND.STEP4: The interface is the same as in the client itself Steam
HOW_TO_FIND.STEP5: After adding a trade url, you need to make sure that your inventory is open, and the account does not have a ban on participating in transactions-exchanges
HOW_TO_FIND.STEP6: A 7-day ban on participation in the exchange is temporarily obtained by users who recently turned on or off the Steam Guard, as well as those who came from a new device
HOW_TO_FIND.STEP7: Be careful not to make a mistake! Incorrect link our system is simply not allowed, and everything else can be fixed at any time, and we will immediately send the item again. Unlike competitors, we provide constant support to users and help people honestly receive their prizes
